documentation.text: @dev Collection of functions related to array types.

@dev Searches a sorted `array` and returns the first index that contains
 a value greater or equal to `element`. If no such index exists (i.e. all
 values in the array are strictly less than `element`), the array length is
 returned. Time complexity O(log n).
 `array` is expected to be sorted in ascending order, and to contain no
 repeated elements.

natspec.details: Collection of functions related to array types.

opcodes: PUSH20 0x0 ADDRESS EQ PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 PUSH19 0xBA4BA0D054CF03A0BFAD331F1015E34AC6C8B3 ADD 0xC6 ADDMOD 0xC3 0xC6 DUP4 CREATE DUP12 0x1F DUP12 EXTCODESIZE CALLDATASIZE PUSH5 0x736F6C6343 STOP MOD 0xC STOP CALLER
